text.en: Tribute 1 Reptile monster; Special Summon up to 1 "Ogdoadic Token"  (Reptile/DARK/Level 2/ATK 0/DEF 0) for every 2 Levels the Tributed monster had on the field. During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 of your banished Reptile monsters; shuffle it into the Deck, then you can send 1 Reptile monsters form your Deck to the GY. You can only use each effect of "Ogdoadic Dawn of Creation" once per turn.
